eff restream.io

The rationale for this project is to make a basic nginx-rtmp restream server with ffmpeg re-encoding because restream.io charges too much.

This project was forked from Live-stream-server-portable-Windows-Nginx-RTMP-HLS-Dash by ustoopia and modified by southern_magilla.

Stats Page

Check the stats page for real-time streaming statistics.
